name: Flunkhy
description: I revisited my old Tumblr account recently, and felt inspired by all these photos that I reblogged (or reposted) as a 13 year old. I remembered laying in bed on Tumblr late into the night, and romanticizing life through photos, poems, and songs I saw on the platform. I used these photos to create a collage and short "I Spy" game in remembrance of my tween years.
